data.message:
People acting like he never dissed a president before. He's KNOWN for slamming people in his songs.   People saying "I don't listen to him since his Trump diss" was never a real fan to begin with because they obviously never paid attention to the words.

On that note. Haters on here dissing Eminem period saying "what kind of person raps about killing their ex and mom." Don't y'all act innocent like you've never pictured some messed up scenarios in your head when you're mad. The difference is he made money off those thoughts and wrote songs about  them. He literally started from the bottom. And I have madd respect for anyone who can do that. 

And further more if you're not a fan then wtf are you doin on his page?? Get off and move along ✌

replies.message: He was silent for 8 years when a communist was president, where the fuck you been?
If you think Obama represented communism, then you need to pull your head out of Trump's ass. Or better yet hop off his tiny dick. The question is where have YOU been?
